Deprecated List

Member mode () const
Obsolete function since version 1.3.4. See QGLViewer::toggleCameraMode().

Member setMode (int)
Obsolete function since version 1.3.4. See QGLViewer::toggleCameraMode(), QGLViewer::setMouseBinding().

Member toggleMode ()
Obsolete function since version 1.3.4. See QGLViewer::toggleCameraMode(), QGLViewer::setMouseBinding().

Member mouseStateKey (int) const
This function is deprecated since libQGLViewer version 1.3.4 and it will print an error message if you use it.

Member draw3DText (const qglviewer::Vec &pos, const qglviewer::Vec &normal, const QString &string, GLfloat height=0.1f)
Similar to drawText(), but the text is handled as a classical 3D object of the scene.
